description: Royal Bank of Canada, facing criticism from climate activists for its lending to oil and gas companies, is creating a new position in its senior executive ranks to implement an effective response to climate issues.  The Head of Climate Transition will be responsible for leading climate strategy at Canada's top bank and will serve as an advisor on "climate transition" to the chief administration and strategy officer, according to the role advertised as on job portals.  Climate and indigenous rights activists have protested against RBC's funding of fossil fuel projects, including TC Energy Corp's Coastal Gaslink pipeline being built on the west coast of British Columbia which is opposed by some indigenous communities.
title: Reuters - Royal Bank of Canada, criticized on climate, seeks executive to tackle issue

description: Despite Shopify (NYSE: SHOP) posting better-than-expected second-quarter revenue and adjusted earnings per share this week, shares of the e-commerce software-as-a-service platform took a hit following the quarterly update.  What's even more surprising is that the stock's decline comes as a handful of analysts upgraded their 12-month price targets for the stock after digesting the solid second-quarter results.  RBC Capital analyst Paul Treiber said in a note to investors on Thursday that he was raising his price target for Shopify stock from $75 to $80.
title: Motley Fool - Shopify Stock: Headed to $80?
